settings.timeline_text: Order now to get it by

settings.template_description: This joint support supplement provides essential nutrients and compounds that support joint health. It features a comprehensive blend of ingredients designed to promote joint flexibility, reduce discomfort, and support overall joint function. This supplement is ideal for daily consumption and aims to enhance your joint health through its potent, natural ingredients without relying on artificial additives.

settings.heading: Benefits
settings.content:
• Maintains healthy joint function
  • Promotes healthy inflammation
  • Enhances hydration and elasticity

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: MSM (methylsulfonylmethane), GlucosaGreen® vegetal glucosamine HCl, Turmeric Powder (root), White Willow Bark Extract, Boswellia serrata Extract (resin)(std. to 65% boswellic acids), Black Pepper Extract (fruit) (std. to 95% piperine), Hyaluronic Acid.

settings.heading: Directions
settings.content: As a dietary supplement, adults take two (2) capsules daily. For best results, take with 6-8 oz of water or as directed by a healthcare professional.

settings.heading: Warning
settings.content:
Do not exceed the recommended dose. Pregnant or nursing mothers, children under 18, and individuals with known medical conditions should consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement. KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN. DO NOT USE IF SAFETY SEAL IS DAMAGED OR MISSING. STORE IN A COOL, DRY PLACE.

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

settings.heading: + Supports Joint Health
settings.text: MSM and GlucosaGreen® vegetal glucosamine HCl are vital for maintaining healthy joint function and flexibility, helping to rebuild cartilage and lubricate joints.

settings.heading: + Enhances Absorption
settings.text: Black Pepper Extract, standardized to 95% piperine, is included to improve the bioavailability of the supplement's ingredients, ensuring more effective nutrient absorption.

settings.heading: + Turmeric and Boswellia serrata
settings.text: Turmeric Powder and Boswellia serrata Extract are recognized for their potential to support joint comfort and function.

settings.heading: + Promotes Hydration and Elasticity
settings.text: Hyaluronic Acid contributes to the maintenance of moisture within the joint tissues, supporting elasticity and preventing the breakdown of cartilage.

settings.title: Pain-free movement
settings.text: I've been dealing with joint pain for years, and this supplement has been a game-changer. I can move without discomfort and feel more flexible than ever. Recommend!
settings.author: Sharon J.

settings.title: Organic and natural
settings.text: I love that this supplement uses natural and organic ingredients. My joints feel better, and I haven't experienced any side effects. So far so good
settings.author: Mark T.

settings.title: Improvement in my mobility and joint pain
settings.text: I was skeptical at first, as I tried many pills like these before and never noticed any difference…After a few weeks on colonbroon pills, I noticed an improvement in my mobility and joint pain. I can now walk more without the usual stiffness and pain.
settings.author: Randy W.

settings.title: Great for inflammation
settings.text: My friend recommended me this product as separately it’s great for inflammation. Can’t wait to try it and hopefully it helps with my joint swelling and discomfort.
settings.author: Marsha K.

settings.title: Easy to take
settings.text: These capsules are easy to take and fit perfectly into my daily routine. I've noticed less joint pain and more flexibility since I started using them.
settings.author: Shavronne  S.

settings.heading: What's the shipping cost?
settings.row_content: On average all order shipping costs are 4.5$ to any state in the US. International shipping costs may vary.

settings.heading: When will I receive my products?
settings.row_content:
All products are shipped out from our fulfilment center within 4-6 business days and on average it takes 1-5 business days to deliver your order. If things go smoothly, you place your order on Monday you should receive it by Friday the same week.

Every now and then, such as holiday seasons, there may be a delay on orders due to the high volume coming in within such a short time period. We value being transparent with our customers, so please be patient as we are a small team doing the best we can! Thanks for your understanding.

settings.heading: What's your return policy?
settings.row_content: In case you receive a product that has been damaged during shipment we will automatically ship out new product for you or issue a full refund. Refer to refund policy on footer of page. If you cancel a non subscription before the order is confirmed to ship you will be issued a full refund. Subscription items can be referred to in subscription policy in footer.

settings.heading: Where are the products manufactured?
settings.row_content: This product is produced under strict quality control standards, ensuring you receive a premium product every time.

settings.heading: Can I track my order?
settings.row_content: Once you will make a purchase and your order will be confirmed, we will send out an order tracking link.

settings.text: We have a no-questions-asked returns policy. Just drop us a line within 30 days and consider it done.

settings.title: Getting started
settings.text: The first 1-3 months are the most challenging. Its critical to stay consistent and disiciplined.

settings.title: First results
settings.text: In the 3-6 months period you will start seeing first results and feel much better.

settings.title: Long lasting
settings.text: Keep your routine going. Remember that you can loose everything in just one day.
